availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Louisville, Kentucky, attorney. Kentucky native. Married to Mary Jane Burkhart Wood. Father of William Wood, Lilly Wood, and Mattie Wood. Practiced in partnership with L. A. Civill.

bibl.p: Tanner’s Louisville Directory, and Business Advertiser for 1861 (Louisville: Henry Tanner, 1861), 267; “Lawyer L.A. Wood,” Louisville Courier-Journal, Dec. 3, 1886, p. 2; Eugene Leroy Wood, Counties of Kentucky: And Connecting Families: Anthony, Bailey, Carlisle, Elder, Eubanks, Hoshor, Hubble, Humphrey, McClure, Penick, Wade.1967. Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Pulaski, Somerset, District 1, p. 6.
